duties_responsibilities.duty: Manages study team activities, including; investigator recruitment and selection, study start-up, enrollment, data collection, drug projections, and reports, consistent with approved budgets/timelines.
Manages and/or oversees the management of study sites, ensuring protocol and regulatory compliance.
Accountable for Clinical Operations deliverables to achieve study objectives and milestones within timelines and budgets.
Ability to execute a clinical study and work with cross functional teams.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (science or healthcare related field)
